extendedInfo.description: The Center for Homicide Research app affords the volunteer-driven, 501 (c)(3) nonprofit organization, the opportunity to broaden its reach to Android mobile users in providing educational materials and services to community members, criminal justice professionals, and researchers on the subject of homicide.The Center aims to disseminate its research and services to a broad audience.  As a presenter at several national conferences, regional task-forces and through face-to-face conversations with community members the Centerâs app would allow individuals who wish to align themselves or support the organization access to do so through their mobile device.   The apps primary use is to direct individuals to the Centerâs resources and also provides an opportunity to give financial support.
